value.name: Advanced Alien Containment
value.description: To secure and research large or dangerous Alien life forms.

value.name: WIP Cells
value.description: (WIP Present In Base Defence and works as Living Quarters for now) A means to hold captured persons.

value.name: WIP Alien Detector
value.description: (WIP None-Functional) A device capable of tracking Aliens from their distinct genetic signatures revealed to us in our Research of the Alien Genetic Structure in combination with our identification of Micronoid life

value.name: Obtain Cult of Sirius Armour
value.description: We need to obtain disguises to aid with investigation of Cult of Sirius activities.

value.name: WIP Dart Weapons
value.description: (WIP Some Sprites are missing) Darts weapons may provide us with a means to lightly damage targets or influence them with all manner of substances.

value.name: WIP Dimension Destabiliser
value.description: (WIP Partially Functional) A device based on disruption field research which could be used to disable Alien disruption shields.

value.name: WIP Dimension Force Field
value.description: (WIP None-Functional) Research of the alien Personal Disruptor Shield may present the opportunity for us to make a more substancial barrier against incoming projectiles.

value.name: WIP ForceWeb
value.description: (WIP None-Functional) A device for incapacitating large creatures or multiple units within a small area.

value.name: WIP Gas Cannon
value.description: (WIP Some Sprites are missing) Suitable for use above and below water, and creating minimal noise for the size and power of it's projectiles, this weapon could prove useful.

value.name: Obtain Surplus Gauss Weaponry
value.description: Rumours circulating the city suggest that there are multiple means for anyone with the money to obtain Gauss weapons left over from previous alien conflicts. We should investigate this potential avenue for acquiring technology no longer produced, or highly controlled, by the main weapons manufacturers.

value.name: Obtain Power Armour
value.description: Many suits of Power Armour circulate within the underworld of Mega Primus, we should look at how to obtain some for ourselves. Power Armour may assist in some of our operations against gangs that use such equipment.

value.name: Obtain Osiron Power Armour Left Arm
Obtain Osiron Power Armour Right Arm
WIP Marsec Psi-Grenade
value.description: (WIP None-Functional) MarSec is known to use a dangerous, psionic, grenade during it's crowd control and anti-riot operations. We should contact them to see if they are willing to supply us too.

value.name: SMART Munitions
value.description: SMART Munitions are Kinetic-Kill projectiles that are capable of guiding themselves toward a target. The ultimate "Magic Bullets"! We should see which manufacturers are willing to make them for us.

value.name: STUN Munitions
value.description: Whilst reliable, the Stun Grapple is not the only way to incapacitate enemy combatants. We should see which manufacturers are willing to sell us "alternative" means of knocking down opponents for capture.

value.name: Obtain Marsec Proximity Mine STUN GAS
Obtain Surplus Laser Weaponry
value.description: Rumours circulating the city suggest that there are multiple means for anyone with the money to obtain Laser weapons left over from previous alien conflicts. We should investigate this potential avenue for acquiring technology no longer produced, or highly controlled, by the main weapons manufacturers.

value.name: Obtain Surplus Plasma Weaponry
value.description: Rumours circulating the city suggest that there are multiple means for anyone with the money to obtain Plasma weapons left over from previous alien conflicts. We should investigate this potential avenue for acquiring technology no longer produced, or highly controlled, by the main weapons manufacturers.

value.name: WIP Tracker Gun
value.description: (WIP None-Functional) A device used to tag targets with a tiny transponder and then proceed to trace around the city.

value.name: WIP Dimension Shifter
value.description: (WIP None-Functional) Transports a vehicle between Dimensions.

value.name: One way to win
value.description: (WIP None-Functional) We must discover a way to beat the Aliens once and for all

value.name: Overspawn Autopsy 1
value.description: A gigantic monster that has ravaged the city.
